website_summaries.verdict: A space-saving decal machine that also prevents waste.
pros: Create custom decals for work or home
Creative endeavors include everything from hard hat decals to unique birthday banners
Arrives compact and light, blending in easily to any area of your home
cons: May require some balancing to ensure creative projects are completed as desired

customer_reviews.title: excellent / very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item so that i can make my own stickers for my planner, since i'm very new to the planner community and didn't want to spend in a silhouette yet. so i got this and I don't regret this at all. it is very light, compact, useful, awesome. I can laminate, I can do my stickers, magnets, etc. in big 9in and 5in very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Redonda

customer_reviews.title: For Me A Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: For scroll saw work using patterns, this is fantastic. I found that repositionable adhesive works best for me. The pattern sticks to my wood throughout the cut, and when finished easily peels off the finished project. I scan the original patterns onto office paper, run those sheets through my Creative Station , peel off the cellophane from each side, place the pattern sticky side down on my wood, then cut out my project. Works fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamcatcher

customer_reviews.title: Laminator is not very good
customer_reviews.text: Tried this with the laminating and followed the directions for the running so many inces out to get it right with no bubbles, etc. It still left bubbles and looked really tacky. This would be ok for kids stuff that was not important or everyday projects maybe but I do not like the laminator aspect of this "machine". Side note: Not to mention the disposable waste that this thing will generate. The giant throw away laminating/sticker/etc roller contraptions would fill up a landfill fast in places that do not have recycling...yes there are places in the US that do not have recycle programs, it's unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Won't need any other adhesive tool after purchasing the Xyron.
customer_reviews.text: I had seen previous models of this brand and wondered if this particular product was really necessary for me. I am so glad I purchased it. With the capability to house both the 5" and 9" rolls I don't need any other product. It's all in one and I can exchange the adhesive for laminate or any other product they have. It's really the best of all the models they've created thus far. I use it all the time now for my paper crafting. I love my Xyron.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: very handy
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I cut a lot of paper with Cricut to assemble into shapes and this is very handy for tiny pieces that are difficult to get a glue dot on. If you use a cardstock that has a glitter on it, this is not quite sticky enough unless you press the piece together with a heavy object until the glue really dries.
customer_reviews.author: mdsiamese

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This machine makes amazing stickers! The only bad part is that the laminating part doesn't stick on it. I used my own laminating first and then made them into stickers because I wanted them to be waterproof. The stickiness of the sticker is perfect! It sticks well, but does not leave residue on my hands. I'm so excited about this! I could start a business making stickers. If you don't mind laminating, I give this a 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-use machine.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! For cheaper than the price of one machine I got a sticker maker, laminator and magnet maker. I use it for homeschool projects and memory keeping/ planning. I have yet to use the magnet part but the laminating and sticker making have worked great. The refills can be a little pricey but have been able to get them for decent prices at Michael's with coupons.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: A must have for crafters!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, absolutely awesome!!!!! I bought the machine (which came with the permanent sticky cartridge. Then I bought one additional 5” magnetic/laminate cartridge. Where has this been all my life?!?!? I just happened about finding it and it’s a game changer for crafters. It’s extremely easy. I got no bubbles or creasing. I think laminate/laminate might be more apt to do that. But for getting sticky on intricate cuts (I use a cricut), this is a must have. And the magnet for pictures or promotional business cards/etc. is super cool. And perhaps laminate/laminate might be great but I have a traditional machine for that.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: All crafters need this machine .
customer_reviews.text: This is the best addition to my Cricut machine and my making of one of a kid frames for my family pictures... I only have the adhesive roll now but have used the other cartridges at work and they are all a must have for everyday life... the laminating , the laminating w adhesive (which I’m ordering next) and the magnetic cartridge which is awesome for turning gear photos into magnets that can be placed on fridge and cars!! Also this bigger model allows you to use the smaller size cartridges too!!! So buy the big one for versatility
customer_reviews.author: Tina G.

customer_reviews.title: Great new version
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this purchase, but I have been thrilled with it. I had a rather ancient first gen of the Xyron 510 that I had managed to final wear out. This version has addressed and solved many of the problems I had with the 510. There is great visibility of the feed, so you know whether your piece has made it thru the machine properly. The fold away handle is genius, allowing me to store it neatly in my crafting room.
customer_reviews.author: A F Graves

customer_reviews.title: My #1 tool for crafting AND household
customer_reviews.text: This is the one tool that is used ALL the time at our house! laminating important papers or cards...making home made stickers and using the laminated top with the sticker bottom is an excellent way to protect hand drawn or colored imagine that will be adhered to a booklet or card! And the best part is - Is is practically fool proof!
customer_reviews.author: Michele White

customer_reviews.title: FURIOUS at this point...
customer_reviews.text: I hate giving terrible reviews unless I'm really upset... I am a repeat buyer and have been using this product since 2015! However, not until late 2016 did I start having wrinkling and crinkling issues with the double laminate. I'm furious at this point because this is not cheap and by the time you finally get the roll aligned (you've wasted so much of the supposed 40ft double laminate) only to laminate a sheet or two if you're lucky to have it wrinkle up again causing you to have to re-align and waste more of your ink, paper and time! Very disappointed... I'm not the first person to have this issue but this is a waste of a product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: out of the box easy use
customer_reviews.text: I like that one unit can use two different size refills 9 in & 5 in , also multiple types of refills permanent adhesive, repositionable adhesive, laminate & magnet, double sided laminate, laminate+ permanent adhesive (5 in only).
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Fun And Not Just For Stickers! Here’s Some Tips!
customer_reviews.text: I love the amount of options you have with refills (sticker, laminate, magnet) and it was easy enough to use. Three warnings, keep printed stickers/magnets you make out of direct sunlight, use indoors only, and avoid full sheets of paper (8x11) for use. These don’t withstand water and the sun makes the ink disappear. Using full sheets works, but sometimes when running through the sticker maker, it’ll start to angle which will cause it to crinkle and screw up your entire piece. I made a gigantic magnet once with four papers taped together and it worked but barely and it wasn’t perfect. Great for cute things and organization, but nothing of the industrial level.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: This is the Xyron to buy, don't go smaller
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful addition to my craft area. I tried the 5" option, because it has the 9" and the 5" option and hated it, much too small for anything to fit. I recommend this machine, don't waste your $ on the smaller Xyron, you will just be limiting yourself in your creativity.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Laminate/Magnetic is great, when it works right!
customer_reviews.text: It has been a few times that I have purchased this item and it has come out defective! The laminate is wrinkled and has ruined many magnets. I sell these magnets and because of this defect, I lost my profit! It has happened that the new cartridge the wrinkles start at the beginning of the cartridge about 2 feet of it. The rest is ok until the end. But this last cartridge that I purchased was ok in the beginning and about 2 feet in, the laminate wrinkled very badly and ruined my magnets. It is wrinkled the entire 8 feet left! It is impossible to correct this and I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ruben Brambila

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I had used the 5" and 1.5" for many years. I saw this in 9" width and purchased it! I use it for my photo mats and matting my photo journals. I can get many pieces ready to stick down and save time not having to individually do each piece. I understand Zyron makes a 12" wide one ! I also use it for backing my USPS Priority mail lables.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the home crafter!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product! I use it to make hand made greeting cards and love how it makes them professional looking. No stiff glue sticking out at the corners or running all over. Works exactly like I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Cclsea

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I repeatedly buy this product and this is about a $5 savings over the local craft stores (which won't always let you use a coupon for it.) I make bookmarks from my leftover scrapbook paper and laminate them for kids, friends and family and two local charities. This is a great product and was shipped VERY quickly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Stickers-Great;Magnets-HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Overall this machine is easy to use. A little wasteful unless you line up several objects on one sheet....makes good stickers/adhesives. BUT.. the laminate magnet cartridge is horrible. Followed instructions exactly as stated & no matter what we tried, the top laminate layer on the magnet wrinkles. Magnet back is fine but finally had to give up...wasted almost the whole cartridge after days of trying magnets of varying sizes. Even used the tip of starting by feeding a piece of cardstock through to check for wrinkles...no luck. Really wanted this to make magnets but at least it can still be used for stickers. But now I've lost $$ on a magnet cartridge😞
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: I have an older xyron that gets put to good use for a variety of tasks regularly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter. I have an older xyron that gets put to good use for a variety of tasks regularly! In my opinion most every household needs one of these! It is great for creating package labels, stickers, decorations, magnets, cold laminating.....and the list goes on!
customer_reviews.author: aggie mom

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great in general, but it often creases and you need to roll out enough to get rid of the crease resulting in loss of material. To avoid that, need to be very careful and slow with the rolling.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Great for card making and scrapbooking
customer_reviews.text: I had the older version and couldn't find affordable replacement cartridges so I took a chance on this. It is amazing as I can use 2 different size cartridges in it and it makes my card making and scrap booking so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've had very good luck using the Creative Station
customer_reviews.text: I've had very good luck using the Creative Station. It takes some practice to get things just right, and a little patience. If you're in a hurry you will certainly waste a lot of the consumables. Just take your time, practice on small items and it'll work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I am new to crafting and this station has made it very easy to laminate and make different items into adhesive stickers. It is the perfect size and is easy to store. I love that it takes both the 5" and 9" cartridges. I bought it used and it was in great condition with the exception of the scratches that came when the owner cut out their name off the box.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiana*Simone

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: I am in love! Makes my crafts much easier, for smaller pieces. My only complaint is, that I have to trace around the edges so I can remove the possibility of the goo going everywhere. So if you had that problem, just get a scoring tool or a pencil, etc and trace around the edges. You’ll be able to remove your sticker without it glue Damaging it.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Left Me Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to laminate anything without getting a crease in it. I had to pull apart the layers and try to align them so no creases would show but it ruined everything I ran through it. After using about a meter or two, maybe it is crease free but I no longer have anything I wanted to use it for. It was all ruined and unsalvageable. It is really thin lamination material. May try it again in the future but now I'm worried about pulling it out and putting it back in and having creases again. IDK.
customer_reviews.author: Shoelace19

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Xyron 900 Blue and gray model perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was very leary of purchasing this because I wasn't sure it would fit the model I have. But it did. I have the blue and gray xyron 900 model. I went ahead and got it because someone asked if it would fit. And they are correct. It fit great and it works great! My daughter wanted to finish making book marks so she needed more laminating paper and we were out. She was excited when I got some in quickly and we got to finish her project. Good price from what I could find online.
customer_reviews.author: smlwoman

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: This creative staion is a huge let down. It not at all what I expected. Its great for stickers but anyting else you are better off using a printer and laminator. (Which is also cheaper in the longrun as these replacement cartridges are not cheap)
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Making stickers.
customer_reviews.text: I had to open it right away and turned one of my stamp images set into stickers. OMG so easy, fast, and its sticker quality adhesive. Also bought the laminate and magnet cartridge too. Used it to make stamp and die cut sheet to keep the sets together. I love it already. Going to need more cartridges soon. Happy crafting crafters.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Love my  Xyron refills
customer_reviews.text: I love my Xyron and the refills. The laminate / magnet is great and the installation was easy and quick. I made car signs for my business and they hold up fairly well, but due to the extreme weather conditions in Florida; either hot or rainy; I will be needing to replace the signs soon. Overall, the refills are great and the magnets work very good; good and strong. I will be reordering soon. When I brought the machine I was afraid that the refills would be expensive, but the price is good and you get a lot of material.
customer_reviews.author: Makathryn Kane

customer_reviews.title: Are we doing it right?
customer_reviews.text: We love the machine and my daughter has made many stickers. But this laminate magnet version has been problematic. The laminate is wrinkled and eventually peels off. The magnet is strong enough to keep on hanging, however.
customer_reviews.author: MAMAJ

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic everything! You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite thing! I turned all my Christmas cards into magnets so my fridge looks amazing. I even did birth and wedding announcements that are there to stay. Then I volunteer so I made cute magnets to give to families with my contact information. I was trying to find more to magnetize!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ross

customer_reviews.title: so much better than waiting for the old thermal laminating unit to ...
customer_reviews.text: so much better than waiting for the old thermal laminating unit to heat up for 5 minutes. and so many different options (magnet, adhesive, laminate) to choose from. Only 'problem' is that is is a little over-sized for a normal 8x11 paper. Need to trim a lot for it to look professional.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adding sticky to big pieces
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! No more mucking around with double sided tape rolls when adding adhesive to big pieces of scrapbook paper for my projects, I just send it through the creative station and I know that every space of my piece of paper will be stuck down - no more pockets of air.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Ravenscroft

customer_reviews.title: SHIPPING WAS INCREIDIBLY FAST!!!
customer_reviews.text: so far love it. they sent this put too quickly! amazing :) my bill on my card hadn't even posted yet! but I received the item and I'm very pleased; I cant wait to make my stickers! endless possibilities. :) thank you for the awesome company/ product! I'll be purchasing every insert, riiiight NOW!
customer_reviews.author: REN

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: very hard to get the paper thru without falling in the middle of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with the result and with how easy it is ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought a xyron Creative Station right before she retired. Several years later I was helping her clean out her house to move and found it. I bought this refill and tried it out on some teaching materials I was creating for my tutoring business. It works very well. I was happy with the result and with how easy it is to laminate. I'm not sure it is the most cost effective lamination out there, but as long as I have one I might as well use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Obermayer

customer_reviews.title: ITEM DOES NOT COME WITH ALL ITS PARTS AS STATED IN THE AD AND ON THE PACKAGING.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, the box states that a cartridge was included as does the description.. However, when I received the product and opened the box - NO Cartridges. Was unable to use it :-( Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Afferton

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: So this was easy to use and worked for what i needed it for but i wish it had more bells and whistles. Its not very exciting once its done one of the few tasks it will accomplish and so i kinda had buyers remorse after the one project i had was done. Felt like i could've had it done at kinkos for less
customer_reviews.author: sewingwithfire

customer_reviews.title: Custom Party Supplies
customer_reviews.text: I used it to make custom plates. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Yolonda D. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Favorite tool in my craft space
customer_reviews.text: Favorite tool in my craft space. This adhesive allows you to make so many projects very quickly and easily. Genius product!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE FOR ANY CRAFTER!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t hesitate just buy!! This machine saves me time and money! No more using the glue stick,m when you have this. It’s so efficient and it comes with 25ft of adhesive to start which lasted so long! I just bought a replacement cartridge and it popped right in, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my old one that just finally wore out from old age. My only complaint is that the cartridges are too expensive but they always have been.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Love the size!
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was automatic... Turning the handle is sometimes uncomfortable due to my arthritis Also, when inserting small pieces it's tricky to navigate, so I'm keeping my 2.5 (had been planning on donating.)
customer_reviews.author: Just Lorry

customer_reviews.title: Fun machine
customer_reviews.text: You do still get adhesion between small holes when using this. It’s easy enough to remove but when watching videos it was shown not to do that. Otherwise works as intended. Made double sided earrings out of leather. This made the process easy and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Caprice

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive roll worked perfectly for a ribbon I ran though it. I reinforced the spine of my planner. I did feel bad for having to waste the space alongside the length of the ribbon but I just couldn't think of anything else I needed to add adhesive to at the time. The back of the ribbon was completely used and worked for my project extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Shoelace19

customer_reviews.title: make your own fridge magnets
customer_reviews.text: we've had a xyron cold laminator since 2002 and have used it for many things. the cartridges available are permanent adhesive, post-it note type adhesive, double sided plastic laminate and one side magnet/one side plastic laminate. (maybe more that I'm not aware of) We used it in a small business for price stickers, fridge magnets and more. At home I use it for mailing labels, fridge magnets, plastic lamination. We bought our daughter one as she is always using up our magnet cartridge for her own uses. Has a sharp cutter so I wouldn't give it to a child under say 12 but it's great for kids, crafters and general household use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed and for the best price. Neither Michaels or Hobby Lobby carried it and while JoAnns does carry it, it was going to cost 34.99 (coupons were not accepted for the product). So, this was not only the best price, I didn't need to leave my house to buy it. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: Did not use it all sent it back would not do what I need to do to do and there is no way to download anyting to this system itself very basic for use
customer_reviews.author: kim lach

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I haven't stopped smiling since I got it. The Xyron is easy to operate, easy to change the cartridge (between permanent adhesive, repositionable adhesive and magnetic backing) and does a great job. If you love paper crafting and scrapbooking, this is a real timesaver - much quicker to run the paper through the Xyron than try and attach double sided sticky tape and also far less messy than using glue. I just wish there was a 12" machine to fit full scrapbook pages.
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr

customer_reviews.title: great product...just came stock on the end...
customer_reviews.text: as part of my xyron equipment I love that i'm able to laminate all my daughter's school important papers, church papers etc. it is very good. the only thing was that the paper was stock at the end and for me to start using it I wasted a good 12 inches long of product because the first inch was stock and when i put the document in it wrinkled it all so it went for waste. once the top and bottom were aligned i was able to use it all with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Redonda

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend a test run before deciding on this item!
customer_reviews.text: Machine is great but useless without the product to go inside. The product (the sticky adhesive back or laminate sheet) quality is hit or miss therefore makes this item useless!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wiloth

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit machine as is, had to modify, but doies work very well!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for an older model laminator, Xyron 900 Creative Station and was warned it may not fit properly but couldn't find any refills for this older model. I had to cut off part of the lower tab on the side to make it fit and works very well besides that. Will probably order another one or two for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but exceeded my expectation....
customer_reviews.text: Xyron exceeded my expectation with this one! I was a bit disappointed with some of my Xyron purchases, maybe because my expectations were too high, perhaps I set the standard of expectation lower , which I doubt, when I purchased the laminating refill (which they said I was getting initially but didn't) and it sure exceeded my expectations with the result. I would recommend. The downside though, the xyron cutter made a MESS of the cutting, I had to use another cutter.
customer_reviews.author: CAR

customer_reviews.title: 5inch one from the same company Xyron and I LOVE it. It truly is idiot proof- super simple
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually reviewing a smaller version of this but I wanted to post it here becuase this is the one I purchased on amazon. I got this one and it was simply too big for the planner stickers I wanted to use it for. So I went and got a 1.5inch one from the same company Xyron and I LOVE it. It truly is idiot proof- super simple!
customer_reviews.author: Price

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it is me or the machine
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one of these - I lost the first two to my grandson and daughter! I have been having difficulty with this one working smoothly - the paper is going crooked and I get wrinkles as a result. I put it aside for now - my favorite version was the original blue one.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: I think it does a great job. It's easy to change the cartridges
customer_reviews.text: I think it does a great job. It's easy to change the cartridges. It only took a couple of times to be comfortable using it. The adhesive is distributed evenly and it looks so much better than using regular glue -- less bumpy and drier so the paper doesn't curl up as with some of the wetter adhesives I've used. Plus it's so fast. I've been careful with positioning the things I'm working with because unlike the wet glue there's no sliding your piece around to get it in position, but so far, so good. I haven't tried the magnet or laminating cartridges, but will someday.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Loving This!!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried the lamination and magnet options yet, but I'm sure I'll love them too! Simple. Easy. Easy. Simple. Will make an excellent gift!
customer_reviews.author: FromBeToReality

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. If you are a small business just starting with a limited budget this is the way to go. Great buy. Came fast. As described. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great for Scrapbooking
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for scrapbooking. It can be used to preserve school program brochures, kid's artwork, and many other things that document activities. I make scrapbooks for each of my grandchildren from birth to graduation from high school. The kids enjoy looking at them and remembering events as they are growing up. Laminated paperwork is a great addition to the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Marjohn

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well at all.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you try to laminate comes out all wrinkled. Tried several ways; same result. I wouldn't waste my money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Musiclady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Made personalized magnets for various purposes (pictures for others and pictures/ sayings for classroom). Had to practice on one first, but relatively easy to use. Good value and magnets came out looking great!
customer_reviews.author: ablearrow

customer_reviews.title: I use it for scroll saw patterns Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Yes I call it a tool,,, I do a lot of scrolling and found it to be very handy. I just print my pattern on paper and then run it through the Xyron and then cut out the pattern and peel off the clear stuff on top of the paper and then peel off the backing and put it on the wood and then put some packing tape over that and then scroll away. The packing tape lubricates the blades so they won't scortch the wood.. Just love it so far. I hope it will last me longer than the large shipping labels did.
customer_reviews.author: Fay N. Prozora

customer_reviews.title: There is more laminate than magnet causing wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and received a replacement item. unfortunately the replacement item was just as bad as the original. I read on another review they had to run it a while to get the laminate to smoothly adhere (wasting a lot of paper) - I tried this and its true but unfortunately I had to waste 4 pages worth - cutting the product usage.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from the old one
customer_reviews.text: I had the old green one for the 9" but it "accidentally" fell and broke so I had to get this one. So far so good! Love how much slimmer this one is. Haven't tried the 5" yet but seems easy enough to switch from the 9 to the 5 and back.
customer_reviews.author: Kery

customer_reviews.title: What does this do ?
customer_reviews.text: So the instructions were very vague. is this just a laminator I thought it was a lot more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Vn

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make labels for a homemade product . Very great. Took a few times to get it correct, but once I did, the labels turned out great. Very versatile.can make personalized stickets, etc.
customer_reviews.author: ablearrow

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but nothing will stick to it
customer_reviews.text: It's a great laminator and I love the ease of use and quality, but I hate that NOTHING will stick to it! I first used it to make quiet folders for my son but Velcro sticky dots won't stick. Tape won't stick. Putty won't stick. Nothing! It's frustrating! So I hope you just want to laminate and not put it on anything. Only luck I've had is taping to the wall from the front and it will stick if it isn't touched.
customer_reviews.author: jbug

customer_reviews.title: Nice sticker maker
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy to put through large sheets of paper that I then run through a die cut machine. The machine allows for two sizes of sticker rolls if you had something smaller to run through. The cutter, like all that are like this is not perfect but it beats using scissors to cut off the sheet each time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Messer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: As an avid scrapbooker, this is the only adhesive I use for my projects. Great price, cheaper than most local craft stores.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to books

customer_reviews.title: Works With Xyron 9" EzLaminator Plus!!
customer_reviews.text: Scrapbooking/Cardmaking is my most favorite hobby of all. I purchased a Cricut Explore one year ago and started Cardmaking a lot more. Xyron adhesives are a must when using any Cricut. I purchase the Xyron EzLaminator Plus at a yard sale for $1 with laminating tape. I was about to purchase a Xyron 9" Creative Station to use adhesive and thought I would try this in my EzLaminator first. It worked, perfect fit! Now I can add adhesive to cardstock/die cuts up to 9" wide! I chose the repositionable adhesive because I can never line anything up straight the first try. Any Xyron product you buy you can't go wrong with. Hands down its the best!
customer_reviews.author: Charolette M.

customer_reviews.title: No electricity needed
customer_reviews.text: Gives a softer more flexible lamination than the hot laminators & no electricity needed, no chance to get burned.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Great for everything. T-Shirt transfers, vinyl stickers, signs. All your creative needs.
customer_reviews.author: Louise M. Sassone

customer_reviews.title: You NEED THIS IN YOUR LIFE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally had the chance to use this bad boy and after printing pictures to use them as a pic collage for my sons writing folder the easiest little thing to create ANY pic or cut out as sticker. Just in time for school projects! Happy as can be!
customer_reviews.author: Mabel F.

customer_reviews.title: Make scrapbooking easier
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Making my scrapbooking projects very easy. Love that the cartridges come in 2 sizes.
customer_reviews.author: mary tedesco

customer_reviews.title: Great for Teachers
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Makes quick work of my classroom decorations and curriculum materials. A smidge pricier than I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: A must have especially if your a crafter!
customer_reviews.text: I am a crafter and this machine is a perfect addition to my craft room especially if you do any kind of paper crafts. It adheres everything so well unlike tape or glue. I like this machine so much that I bought one for my sister in law as she is a crafter as well and she loves hers as much as I do! It’s definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really expensive
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it for her crafting activities, but his stuff is really expensive $14.00 for 10 feet!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The package came in undamaged and the film was easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Not as easy to insert into the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Not as easy to insert into the machine as some of the others, but that is due to the thickness of the magnet. The magnet holds great! I've had some that just weren't strong enough to hold anything up, but this is great. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Chandler

customer_reviews.title: A great item to seal items
customer_reviews.text: Love this item as daughter lives in isolation. My cards, drawings can be sealed for her.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma fred

customer_reviews.title: Like the idea and ease
customer_reviews.text: Like the idea and ease of use but you do have to be careful when feeding small things the rods that it doesn't flip over. Downfall is if you are not careful you will waste alot of the product.
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It works well with the small laminator, but the cartridges are wasteful. You have a plastic cartridge left after each refill, and no way to recycle it. It would be nice if the creative station let you just load the adhesive into a cartridge that was part of the machine. Also, we go through these pretty quickly. It would be nice if they came with more adhesive for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Fun product for Xyron laminator
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fun and easy to use with my Xyron laminator
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Good in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: PRO's: It make life easy (when it works) CON's: There is not a lot of product on 1 roll, Product tears easily, Quality vs price is not cost effective!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wiloth

customer_reviews.title: Same number, but design has changed
customer_reviews.text: Will not work on my older EzLaminator, the part number is the same but it will not fit into the machine. The side design is different.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Gulledge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect-great for all my projects.
customer_reviews.text: Just simply love this machine! Love it, love it! Really like how I can use either the 5"or 9" cartridges according to my project's need.
customer_reviews.author: Wannetta

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my Xyron cartridges
customer_reviews.text: This works great for non heat laminate. I enjoy using all the Xyron products and this one is no exception. Works great
customer_reviews.author: A. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Xyron EzLaminator 900
customer_reviews.text: This is not made to fit the Xyron EzLaminator 900. I checked multiple websites before purchasing and they said that it would fit. We were able to make it work by cutting off some of the plastic on the side, but unless you are a real MacGyver, this will not work for the 900.
customer_reviews.author: T MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Extremely useful, now I can make any stickers I want! Very nice for making your things have a style that fits you the best. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Iven Siller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Xyron lamination film and received it promptly and well-packed. I use it on my old Xyron 900 and it slides in perfectly-- just like the original film did --if you're wondering about the fit. I'll definitely be ordering more in the future
customer_reviews.author: TX mom

customer_reviews.title: A great product for teachers!
customer_reviews.text: This product has me creating materials for my classroom much faster! I no longer have to use glue sticks or smelly rubber cement!
customer_reviews.author: Vern

customer_reviews.title: Irresponsible shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible I received the equipment totally damaged, no cutter
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. AL Rochstad

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: We make our very own stickers and laminate small objects with this little gadget. One of my best buys. Good for preserving objects you want to reuse.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: Although I had some difficulty with delivery of this product - I found things overall pretty satisfactory! I got this cartridge for my creative station which uses 5 inch and 9 inch cartridges; this one fits just fine and is easy to use and produces clean finished products with little to no difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Marie K.

customer_reviews.title: Too much fun
customer_reviews.text: I love love love my Xyron!! I've used the one at work so many times, and always wanted one of my own, now I finally have it, and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Gilkey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly how they say it would work. Its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Myz Dynamic Dee

customer_reviews.title: I love the Xyron 900
customer_reviews.text: I love the Xyron 900! It is so convenient to have both laminating and magnet options in one machine...and so easy to change cartridges! The only thing that would make it better would be if it came in a larger size. Love it! Love it! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AZADAS70

customer_reviews.title: item arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item a 2 cause the end of the magnet wheel was broken. I worked with it and was able to get it to work within my unit but now I'm afraid to take it out in order to replace it with one of my other lamination refills. I've never had this issue before and am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Litfin

product_meta.title: Xyron Creative Station, 9” x 5”, Craft Supplies & Scrapbooking Supplies, Small Label Maker, Makes Invitations, Handmade Cards, Flash Cards, Stickers, Perfect for Home School & Home Office (624632)
product_meta.description: Style:MachineWith only a few turns of the handle, the Xyron creative station effortlessly applies edge-to-edge adhesive with no electricity or warm-up time. Replace your messy glue sticks, smelly spray mount and double-sided tape with acid-free, non-toxic adhesive for sleek, professional results. This handy machine accepts both 9" and 5" cartridges to help minimize waste and maximize flexibility of all your craft projects. It comes pre-loaded with one 25 foot by 9 inch permanent adhesive cartridge, and also accepts laminate and magnet refills (sold separately). Great for arts and crafts, the creative station can help you make wedding invitations, handmade cards, educational flash cards, stickers, labels and more.
feature_bullets: Ready when you are – This non-electric machine has no warm-up time. Effortlessly apply edge-to-edge adhesive with only a few turns of the handle and very little clean up.
No-mess adhesive – Replace your messy glue sticks, smelly spray mount and double-sided tape. Apply acid-free, non-toxic adhesive for sleek, professional results.
Two cartridge sizes – Tackle projects big and small. This handy machine accepts both 9" and 5" cartridges to help minimize waste and maximize flexibility of all your craft projects.

Easy drop-in cartridge – Comes pre-loaded with one 25 foot by 9 inch permanent adhesive cartridge. Also accepts laminate and magnet refills (sold separately). Insert items up to .125 inch thick, including paper, embellishments, vellum, fabric and ribbon
Endless creativity – Great for arts and crafts, the creative station can help you make wedding invitations, handmade cards, educational flash cards, stickers, labels and more
Laminator, Sticker Maker, Magnet Maker in one simple machine
Comes loaded with one 25 foot by 9 inch Permanent Adhesive Cartridge
Uses either 9 inch or 5 inch drop in cartridges
Does not require batteries, heat or electricity
Available cartridges include permanent or repositionable adhesive, two sided laminate, laminate/magnet and laminate/adhesive

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars915 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
